Name: Necronomistore Classic
About the game: A Short But Sweet Manic, Arcade, Point And Click Adventure Game Made With FACTORY GROWN LOVE COMPOUND Upon your Hectic first day working as a Shop Clerk for the Necronomistore Corporation, something seems amiss. Strange customers berate you and shadowy figures lurk in the distance. During a stormy night, a mysterious package arrives and from there on a rabbit hole of a conspiracy unfolds surrounding the Necronomistore Brand, local disappearances and a shady labour ring. Now, the only way out is to go deeper within the Corporation and follow their commands to uncover the truth about what is really taking place. Put that trusty disembodied demon mitt of yours to good use and scan like you mean it! Beat the timer with the set score needed to progress to another torturous level or suffer the fate of replayidation (dont google that, just pretend its a word). Scan to see if items are certified passable at best or rotten to the core. Now go and show that crusty old Harold the Bird that you arent just a pushover Features Include: - 4 Action Packed Levels - Strange And Unique Customers For Each Stage - Intense Grocery Bagging Mechanics! - An Immersive And Relaxing Soundtrack Current Build Only Supports Windows
